name: xDrip
tagline: An android application that wirelessly reads the Dexcom transmitter
body: ### xDrip ** Please note this is __NOT__ a product created by or backed by Dexcom, you can check them out [here](http://dexcom.com/) ** * A wireless bluetooth bridge that lets your phone pick up readings from your Dexcom transmitter which means **More convenient access to your data and less bulk!!** * Custom algorithm that thus far seems to [hold its own against Dexcoms](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip/blob/gh-pages/battle_of_the_dexes.md) Of course, that was only a 1 time test. * **Please note:** I personally have only ever compared this to the adult version of the Dexcom Algorithm, therefore I cannot recommend it for anyone under the age of 18 * **Also note:** This is experimental! * **Also Also note:** The algorithm was out of necessity rather than the point of the project, since we cant use the dexcom one I had to write my own, calibration check in mode gives you the option to [use theirs! (kinda!)](http://bit.ly/1LdmZiN) * No plugging things into your receiver or your phone, phone can be used as a normal phone! ### Complete with NightScout Support!!! ### Currently there are 2 parts * one is the [Relay/Bridge](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/wixel-xDrip) [(the wixel and bluetooth component)](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip/blob/gh-pages/hardware_setup.md) which catches Dexcom transmissions them and then sends them out over BT * The second part is the [Android App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip), this receives that data and graphs it out for you (and allows you to enter calibrations) * Both are available and ready for you to use! ### Pictures ### LINKS * [What you will need & Diagrams](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip/blob/gh-pages/hardware_setup.md) * [Wixel App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/wixel-xDrip) * [Android App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip) ### Setup Videos * [Building the Wireless Bridge (in amazing depth and detail!!!)](http://youtu.be/YuxCUeJ9xAU) * [Generating the Android app APK](http://youtu.be/Xv0PuM7dnYo) Both of these amazing videos were created by Ly!! ### The ins and outs of xDrip and NightScout * [xDrip, an Introduction](http://circles-of-blue.winchcombe.org/index.php/2015/01/11/wearenotwaiting-thanks-to-dexdrip-introduction/) * [NightScout and xDrip, how they work together](http://circles-of-blue.winchcombe.org/index.php/2015/01/25/dexcom-nightscout-and-dexdrip-how-does-it-all-work-together/) * [Building a xDrip](http://circles-of-blue.winchcombe.org/index.php/2015/01/22/a-dummys-guide-to-building-a-dexdrip-wearenotwaiting/) * [Insulin Nations article that makes this all sound dark and mischievous](http://insulinnation.com/devices/meters-and-cgms/diabetes-hacker/) ### Stay Up to Date! Follow me on twitter `@StephenIsTaken`, I will let everyone know when updates happen that you should definitely download! Updates will be rolling out fairly frequently as there is lots to do!!! ### GET STARTED! * [What you will need & Diagrams](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip/blob/gh-pages/hardware_setup.md) * [Wixel App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/wixel-xDrip) * [Android App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip) ### Want to help out? AWESOME, let me know, put up some PRS, lets make it awesome! ### Awesome Contributors: (in no particular order, because they are all awesome) * [@tzachi-dar](https://github.com/tzachi-dar) * [@jstevensog](https://github.com/jstevensog) * [@bhandfast](https://github.com/bhandfast) * [@LorelaiL](https://github.com/LorelaiL) * [@syntaxerr66](https://github.com/syntaxerr66) * [@saercnap](https://github.com/saercnap) * [Ly](http://youtu.be/YuxCUeJ9xAU) * [Kev](http://circles-of-blue.winchcombe.org/) * Whoever else is supporting this and helping people out!! ### You should also check out my other project NightWatch! [NightWatch](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/NightWatch/blob/master/README.md)
